SELECT bcd , btitle , bcont , TO_CHAR(bdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') bdate , blike , bvisit , mid FROM BOARD WHERE 1= 1
AND bdate >= TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ROWNUM < 6
ORDER BY blike , bvisit DESC
